mapper.insert: insert into s_user (user_id, user_name, password, create_date) values (#{userInfo.userId}, #{userInfo.username}, #{userInfo.password}, now())
mapper.select: select user_id as userId, user_name as username, password as password, create_date as createDate, last_update_date as lastUpdateDate from s_user where user_name = #{username}
select sr.role_name from s_role sr join s_user_role_mapping surm on sr.role_id = surm.role_id where surm.user_id = #{userInfo.userId};
